title: Ping Issue - always 160 to 165 ms....
body:
Hi, 

I have a great connection at home 60 to 80 mps but it seems that my ping is never going below 160 ms... 
Would you know why ? 

some info maybe helpful : 
- I play on NA server but from California (San Francisco) 
- My router is a Asus RT-AC66U Dual Band 
- I play with an HP Elite Book ; Wireless HW is Intel Dual Band Wireless AC7269
- Processor is Intel i7 - 4600U CPU @ 2.10Ghz / 2.70Ghz - RAM - 8GB

I am a beginner but i can start feeling the difference with a 160ms now and it's getting difficult to play ...

Any advice / comment on what might be wrong would be much appreciated.

replies.body: A consistently high ping may suggest an issue with your network maintaining a stable connection, or packet loss due to your ISP's routing to our server.  Rinney provided a [Troubleshooting Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide that can provide some steps in resolving this.  If your issue persists, please run a [traceroute ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)and [send it to our player support team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) who can look into this for you.
